Class WikiManager

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpClient<RedditResponse>, NetworkAccessible<RedditResponse,RedditClient>

    public class WikiManager
extends AbstractManager
    This class is responsible for managing a wiki

      • getSettings

        public WikiPageSettings getSettings(java.lang.String page)
                             throws NetworkException
        Gets the settings for a wiki page for the front page. Must be an admin.
        Parameters:
        page - The page to get
        Returns:
        A WikiPageSettings that represents the settings of the given wiki page
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If there request was not successful

      • getSettings

        @EndpointImplementation(value=WIKI_SETTINGS_PAGE_GET)
public WikiPageSettings getSettings(java.lang.String subreddit,
                                                                             java.lang.String page)
                             throws NetworkException
        Gets the settings for a wiki page for a certain subreddit. Must be a moderator of that subreddit.
        Parameters:
        subreddit - The subreddit to use. Use null or an empty string for the front page.
        page - The page to get
        Returns:
        A WikiPageSettings that represents the settings of the given wiki page
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If there request was not successful
